turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a beverage from Starbucks in Bridgeport.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a cinnamon dolce latte venti with coconut milk, whip cream and two pumps of caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: a venti cinnamon dolce latte with coconut milk, whipped cream and two pumps of caramel, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, to be picked up at the Bridgeport location on East Main Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks east main street.
